question: Which is the world's most liveable city as per 20th annual Quality of Living survey by Mercer?
explanation: As per 20th annual Quality of Living survey by Mercer, Austria's capital city Vienna rated the world's most liveable city. It was followed by Switzerland's Zurich, while New Zealand's Auckland and Germany's Munich tied for third place. Hyderabad and Pune have been rated India's most livable cities as they have tied for the 142nd place in Mercer's global Quality of Living survey. Iraq's capital city Baghdad has been rated the least liveable city for the tenth consecutive year.
